Package SecureResServer.SecureResServer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Sample code to run Resource Server.
    batonCompression  
    cborConverter
    This class is used for encoding some data as CBOR and vice versa.
    CoapDemoResource  
    CoapHcapParentResource
    This class is the represents the parent resource of all the default resources part of HCAP protocol.
    CoapValidateResource
    This class is used to validate a capability, the capability is sent by another resource server and the other resource server request this server to validate the capability on its behalf.
    HashFunctionality  
    HCAPAuthorize
    This class is used to check request for its authenticity.
    HCAPHandleRequest
    This class is basically used to handle the request payload.
    HCAPInformation
    This class can be used to store information to be passed on to HCAP message deliverer.
    HCAPMessageDeliverer
    This class encapsulates the access control code.
    HCAPPermissionParser
    This class is used to parse a permission, i.e.
    HCAPPingResource
    This class represents the HCAP Ping resource.
    HCAPResourceServer  
    jsonConverter
    This class is used for encoding some data as CBOR and vice versa.
    Pair
    This class is used to generate a pair of two values, the request code and resource ID.
    TestConversions  
    TestGC  
    updateExList
    This class is used in the process of Garbage Collection, it basically updates the exception list by sending it as a request to the Authorization server.
    ValidationAlgorithm
